summary.span: 此方法实现由 [W3C XSL 转换 (XSLT)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=49919) 指定的 element-available 函数。

span.span: This method implements the element-available function specified by [W3C XSL Transformations (XSLT)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=49919).

returns.span: 如果展开名称是指令的名称，则为 。

span.span: if the expanded name is the name of an instruction.

returns.span: 如果 具有的命名空间 URI 等于 XSLT 命名空间 URI，则它引用由 XSLT 定义的元素。

span.span: If the has a namespace URI equal to the XSLT namespace URI, then it refers to an element defined by XSLT.

returns.span: 否则，该展开名称引用扩展元素。

span.span: Otherwise, the expanded-name refers to an extension element.

returns.span: 如果 的命名空间 URI 为空，则 element-available 函数将返回 。

span.span: If the has a null namespace URI, the element-available function will return .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 限定名 `expanded name` 通过使用表达式范围内的命名空间声明扩展为。The qualified name is expanded into an `expanded name` by using the namespace declarations in scope for the expression. `true` 当且仅当是指令的名称时，函数才返回 `expanded name` 。The function returns `true` if and only if the `expanded name` is the name of an instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 `value` 使用 `formatPicture` 和十进制格式的[扩展名称](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148269)进行格式设置。The method formats `value` by using the `formatPicture` and decimal-format [expanded name](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148269). `errorMessageName`仅用于错误报告，并且必须包含十进制格式对象的限定名称。The `errorMessageName` is used only for error reporting and must contain the qualified name of the decimal-format object.

param.name: opCode
param.span: 指定如何计算两个表达式：

span.span: Specifies how to perform the evaluation of two expressions:

param.span: 如果操作码等于 2，则计算 XPath 表达式“左侧 < 右侧”。

span.span: If opCode is equal to 2, evaluates the XPath expression "left < right".

param.span: 如果操作码等于 3，则计算 XPath 表达式“左侧 <= 右侧”。

span.span: If opCode is equal to 3, evaluates the XPath expression "left <= right".

param.span: 如果操作码等于 4，则计算 XPath 表达式“左侧 > 右侧”。

span.span: If opCode is equal to 4, evaluates the XPath expression "left > right".

param.span: 如果操作码等于 5，则计算 XPath 表达式“左侧 >= 右侧”

span.span: If opCode is equal to 5, evaluates the XPath expression "left >= right"
Expression to evaluate.
Expression to evaluate.

summary.span: 根据传递的 计算 表达式是大于等于还是小于等于 表达式。

span.span: Evaluates whether the expression is greater than or equal to, or less than or equal to, the expression based on the passed.

returns.span: 一个布尔值，如果左侧表达式大于或等于右侧表达式，则为 True。

span.span: A Boolean value that is true if the left expression is greater than or equal to the right expression.
